description:
Representation & Participation
Formerly "Building effective electoral systems"

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities of national human rights institutions
subproject.description:
- The Electoral Commission adopts appropriate technology to simplify its operations and become more efficient
- The breadth and depth of electoral education is expanded and citizens understand the elctoral systems and are able to participate
- Citizens, CSOs and traditional authorities understand their roles within the decentralisation framework, and are able to participate qualitatively
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Representation & Participation
